snippet.title: Pathway - Offical OST Preview
snippet.description:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/546430

Official Pathway OST preview by Gavin Harrison.

Pathway is a strategy adventure game featuring turn-based combat and unique story encounters. Explore temples, tombs and the desert wilderness in a grand pulp adventure!

Presented by Chucklefish and produced by Robotality.

Official Website: http://www.pathway-game.com

Robotality on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/robotality
Chucklefish on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/chucklefishLTD
Gavin Harrison on Twitter: https://twitter.com/GHarrisonSounds
